themes.name: Federal Research Coordination
themes.description: Policies focused on coordinating research resources and activities across federal agencies to maximize effectiveness and avoid duplication.

themes.name: Artificial Intelligence
themes.description: Policies related to the development, regulation, and deployment of artificial intelligence technologies, including AI infrastructure, safety standards, and competitive positioning.

themes.name: National Security
themes.description: Policies related to protecting the nation from threats, including defense, intelligence, cybersecurity, and homeland security measures.

themes.name: Scientific Research
themes.description: Policies supporting scientific inquiry, research funding, laboratory operations, and the advancement of knowledge across scientific disciplines.

themes.name: Technology Development
themes.description: Policies promoting the creation, innovation, and deployment of new technologies to enhance economic competitiveness and national capabilities.

themes.name: Counterterrorism Policy
themes.description: Policies focused on identifying, designating, and countering terrorist organizations to protect national security.

themes.name: Foreign Policy
themes.description: Policies governing the United States’ interactions and strategic relations with other nations and international groups.

themes.name: Trade Policy
themes.description: Policies governing international trade, tariffs, trade agreements, and economic relationships with foreign countries.

themes.name: Child Welfare Policy
themes.description: Policies and initiatives focused on improving child welfare systems, including foster care, adoption, and child protection services.

themes.name: Federal Workforce
themes.description: Policies related to the management, hiring, and organization of federal government employees and staffing procedures.

themes.name: Immigration Enforcement
themes.description: Policies that prioritize staffing and resources towards enforcing immigration laws and border security.

themes.name: Public Safety
themes.description: Policies aimed at hiring and staffing to enhance public safety functions within federal agencies.

themes.name: Advisory Committees Management
themes.description: Policies governing the continuation, oversight, and organizational responsibilities of federal advisory committees.

themes.name: Immigration Investment
themes.description: Policies related to immigration tied to financial investment or economic contributions by immigrants.

themes.name: Federal Property Management
themes.description: Policies governing the design, construction, maintenance, and aesthetic standards of federal buildings and infrastructure.

themes.name: Symbol Protection
themes.description: Policies focused on protecting national symbols and addressing related acts of desecration or disrespect.

themes.name: Pharmaceutical Supply Chain
themes.description: Policies focused on securing and strengthening the supply of pharmaceutical ingredients and medicines within the United States.

themes.name: Regulatory Reform
themes.description: Policies focused on reducing, streamlining, or modernizing regulations to encourage industry growth and innovation.

themes.name: Space Policy
themes.description: Policies related to space exploration, commercial space activities, and space infrastructure development.

themes.name: Federal Agency Management
themes.description: Policies related to the organization, leadership, succession, and operational management of federal government agencies and departments.

themes.name: Financial Regulation
themes.description: Policies focused on the regulation and oversight of financial institutions and banking practices.

themes.name: Event Coordination
themes.description: Policies focused on government coordination and planning for large-scale national or international events and their logistical, security, and operational needs.

themes.name: Public Health Promotion
themes.description: Policies aimed at improving the physical and mental health of the population through fitness, nutrition, and active lifestyles.

themes.name: Sports Policy
themes.description: Policies related to the regulation, support, and integrity of amateur and collegiate sports in the United States.

themes.name: Energy Policy
themes.description: Policies related to the development, regulation, and support of domestic energy production and sources.

themes.name: Public Lands Management
themes.description: Policies related to the management, preservation, funding, and access of public lands and recreational areas including national parks.

themes.name: Veterans Affairs Policy
themes.description: Policies focused on the administration, care, services, benefits, and housing specific to military veterans.

themes.name: Religious Liberty
themes.description: Policies focused on protecting and promoting the constitutional rights and freedoms related to the free exercise of religion.

themes.name: Media Policy
themes.description: Policies regulating the funding, oversight, and standards of media organizations.

themes.name: Education Policy
themes.description: Policies related to improving educational institutions, promoting educational equity, and supporting students and educators.

themes.name: Supply Chain Security
themes.description: Policies focused on identifying and mitigating risks in critical supply chains to ensure economic and national security resilience.

themes.name: Federal Procurement Policy
themes.description: Policies governing purchasing practices and acquisition rules within the federal government.

themes.name: Consumer Protection
themes.description: Policies aimed at protecting consumers from unfair, deceptive, or exploitative marketplace practices across industries.

themes.name: Legal Profession Policy
themes.description: Policies related to oversight, conduct, and reform within the legal profession and law firms.

themes.name: Data Governance
themes.description: Policies focused on managing and facilitating the sharing, access, and quality of government data assets.

themes.name: Disaster Preparedness
themes.description: Policies focused on improving readiness, response, and resilience to natural and man-made disasters at federal, state, and local levels.

themes.name: Language Policy
themes.description: Policies establishing or regulating an official or national language for government operations and national identity.

themes.name: Fertility Policy
themes.description: Policies aimed at improving access to fertility treatments and addressing reproductive health challenges.

themes.name: Environmental Regulation
themes.description: Policies related to environmental impacts, sustainability, and regulations affecting environmental outcomes.

themes.name: Sovereign Wealth Fund Management
themes.description: Policies related to the creation, governance, investment strategies, and legal frameworks of sovereign wealth funds established by the government.

themes.name: Parental Rights
themes.description: Policies related to protecting and enforcing parental authority and rights in educational settings.

themes.name: Civil Rights Enforcement
themes.description: Policies focused on monitoring, enforcing, and protecting civil rights protections against discrimination and harassment.

themes.name: Military Personnel Policy
themes.description: Policies related to personnel management, culture, and ideological guidance within the U.S. Armed Forces and military educational institutions.

themes.name: Abortion Policy
themes.description: Policies regulating federal funding and restrictions related to abortion services.

themes.name: Criminal Justice Enforcement
themes.description: Policies focused on the enforcement and administration of criminal justice laws and penalties, including prosecution priorities and sentencing.

themes.name: Free Speech Policy
themes.description: Policies focused on protecting constitutional rights related to freedom of speech and expression from government interference, including limiting censorship and promoting open discourse.

themes.name: Place Based Economic Development
themes.description: Policies and programs focused on targeted economic development efforts tailored to specific geographic regions or communities.

themes.name: Economic Development
themes.description: Policies aimed at stimulating economic growth, job creation, and business expansion through investments, incentives, and infrastructure improvements.

themes.name: Community Development
themes.description: Policies focused on improving local communities through housing, infrastructure, services, and programs that enhance quality of life for residents.

themes.name: Labor Relations
themes.description: Policies addressing labor disputes, collective bargaining, and mechanisms for resolving conflicts between employers and employee unions.

themes.name: Firearms Control
themes.description: Policies focused on regulating, restricting, and managing the use, manufacture, and trafficking of firearms and related devices to reduce gun violence and public safety risks.

themes.name: School Safety
themes.description: Policies aimed at protecting students, educators, and staff within educational environments, focusing on violence prevention, emergency preparedness, and trauma-informed practices.

themes.name: Gender History Recognition
themes.description: Policies focused on highlighting, preserving, and promoting the history and contributions of women and gender groups in national heritage and federal programs.

themes.name: Women Health Research
themes.description: Policies focused on advancing biomedical and clinical research specifically aimed at understanding and improving women's health, including addressing disparities and unique health conditions affecting women.

themes.name: Privacy And Data Security
themes.description: Policies focused on protecting individuals’ personal information, including sensitive data privacy, data access restrictions, and mitigation of privacy risks in digital environments.

themes.name: Maritime Security
themes.description: Policies focused on protecting maritime vessels, ports, harbors, and waterfront facilities from physical and cyber threats to ensure safe and secure maritime operations.

themes.name: Workforce Development
themes.description: Policies focused on developing skills, training, career pathways, and employment opportunities to strengthen the labor force, especially in federally supported projects and programs.

themes.name: Public Health Administration
themes.description: Policies related to the organization, management, and coordination of public health emergency response and preparedness efforts within the federal government.

themes.name: Data Security Regulation
themes.description: Policies focused specifically on regulating access to and safeguarding bulk personal and government-related data from foreign adversaries.

themes.name: Tribal Policy
themes.description: Policies focused on federal relations, funding, and support aimed specifically at strengthening Tribal Nations, honoring trust responsibilities, and promoting Tribal sovereignty and self-determination.

themes.name: Equity And Inclusion Policy
themes.description: Policies focused on advancing equity, justice, and inclusion for historically underserved or minority communities within federal government efforts.

themes.name: Industrial Accident Response
themes.description: Policies focused on the federal government’s coordination of responses to industrial accidents involving hazardous materials, including cleanup, public health, and safety measures.

themes.name: Reproductive Health Policy
themes.description: Policies focused on ensuring access to contraception, family planning services, and reproductive healthcare across federal programs and healthcare systems.

themes.name: Caregiving Policy
themes.description: Policies aimed at improving caregiving services, support for family and professional caregivers, and the infrastructure surrounding early childhood and long-term care.

themes.name: Federal Pay Policy
themes.description: Policies focused on the determination, adjustment, and administration of pay rates and salary structures for federal government employees across various pay systems.

themes.name: Pharmaceutical Cost Control
themes.description: Policies focused on reducing prescription drug prices and managing costs within healthcare programs like Medicare and Medicaid.

themes.name: Cultural Policy
themes.description: Policies focused on supporting, preserving, and promoting the arts, humanities, museums, libraries, cultural heritage, and creative sectors.

themes.name: Bioeconomy Policy
themes.description: Policies focused on fostering economic activities derived from biotechnology and biomanufacturing, including innovation, commercialization, data infrastructure, and sustainability within the life sciences sector.

themes.name: Hostage Recovery Policy
themes.description: Policies related to the prevention, response, and recovery efforts involving hostages and wrongfully detained nationals abroad, including interagency coordination, family support, and diplomatic and punitive measures.

themes.name: Lgbtq+ Rights Policy
themes.description: Policies focused specifically on advancing the rights, protections, and well-being of LGBTQI+ individuals across federal government programs and external engagements.

themes.name: Law Enforcement Accountability
themes.description: Policies focused on improving transparency, misconduct investigations, discipline, and overall accountability within law enforcement agencies.

themes.name: Climate Change Mitigation
themes.description: Policies and actions focused specifically on reducing greenhouse gas emissions and enhancing carbon sequestration to address climate change.

themes.name: Nature Based Solutions
themes.description: Policies that deploy ecosystem-based approaches for climate adaptation, disaster resilience, and environmental restoration.

themes.name: Healthcare Access
themes.description: Policies focused on improving access to affordable, quality healthcare coverage and services for the American population.

themes.name: Digital Assets Policy
themes.description: Policies focused on the regulation, development, oversight, and systemic implications of digital assets, cryptocurrencies, and central bank digital currencies.

themes.name: Humanitarian Economic Support
themes.description: Policies focused on protecting and managing financial resources to support humanitarian needs in countries facing crises, including blocking or safeguarding assets for civilian benefit.

themes.name: Transnational Crime Policy
themes.description: Policies focused on preventing, disrupting, and coordinating government action against transnational criminal organizations operating across borders.

themes.name: Customer Experience Improvement
themes.description: Policies focused on enhancing the quality, accessibility, and responsiveness of government services and interactions with the public across federal agencies.

themes.name: Federal Sustainability Policy
themes.description: Policies focused on integrating sustainability, environmental stewardship, and climate resilience into federal government operations and management.

themes.name: Infrastructure Policy
themes.description: Policies related to the planning, funding, coordination, and implementation of physical infrastructure projects and programs across federal, state, local, tribal, and territorial governments.

themes.name: Disease Control Policy
themes.description: Policies focused on controlling communicable diseases through quarantine, isolation, and other public health measures to prevent disease spread.

themes.name: Information Transparency
themes.description: Policies focused on increasing public access to government information while balancing security and privacy concerns.

themes.name: Antitrust Policy
themes.description: Policies focused on enforcing antitrust laws and promoting competition by preventing monopolies, market concentration, and unfair business practices across industries.

themes.name: Investment Restrictions
themes.description: Policies focused on limiting or controlling financial investments in entities that pose a risk to national security or foreign policy interests.

themes.name: Anti Discrimination Policy
themes.description: Policies focused specifically on preventing, addressing, and responding to racial, ethnic, and other forms of discrimination and hate crimes targeted at minority communities.

themes.name: Climate Finance Risk Management
themes.description: Policies focused on identifying, assessing, mitigating, and disclosing financial risks caused by climate change and transitioning economies.

themes.name: Cybersecurity Policy
themes.description: Policies focused specifically on protecting digital infrastructure, networks, information systems, and responding to cyber threats and incidents at the federal level.

themes.name: Judiciary Policy
themes.description: Policies related to the organization, structure, reform, and oversight of the judicial branch of government.

themes.name: Voting Rights Policy
themes.description: Policies focused on protecting, expanding, and facilitating the fundamental right to vote, including combating voter suppression and improving access to elections for all eligible citizens.

themes.name: Humanitarian Immigration Policy
themes.description: Policies specifically focused on refugee resettlement, humanitarian visas, and protections for populations displaced due to conflict or other crises.

themes.name: Climate Migration Policy
themes.description: Policies addressing migration and displacement driven directly or indirectly by climate change, including planned relocation and protection mechanisms.

themes.name: Immigration Process Reform
themes.description: Policies focused specifically on reviewing, improving, and streamlining the procedural aspects of the legal immigration and naturalization systems to enhance accessibility and efficiency.

themes.name: Regional Migration Policy
themes.description: Policies focused on collaboration and strategic frameworks addressing migration challenges and opportunities within a defined geographic region involving multiple countries.

themes.name: Pandemic Economic Relief
themes.description: Policies aimed at responding to the economic impacts caused by pandemics, focusing on relief measures for affected individuals, businesses, and government entities.

themes.name: Government Ethics
themes.description: Policies focused on ethical standards, conflict of interest restrictions, and integrity requirements for government officials and appointees.

themes.name: Pandemic Response Coordination
themes.description: Policies focused on coordinating federal, state, and local efforts to respond to pandemics, including resource allocation, interagency collaboration, and public health emergency management.

themes.name: Census And Apportionment Policy
themes.description: Policies related to the conduct, accuracy, and legal requirements of the national census and the apportionment of congressional representation based on population counts.

themes.name: Technology Regulation
themes.description: Policies related to setting rules and standards for technology providers to prevent misuse and ensure security.

themes.name: Historical Commemoration
themes.description: Policies focused on honoring and memorializing historical figures, events, and legacies through monuments, statues, memorials, and related projects.

themes.name: Wildfire Management Policy
themes.description: Policies focused on coordinating and improving federal and intergovernmental strategies, resource allocation, and operational practices for managing wildfires and related land and community protection.
